ProductInfo.Features:
9.7 inch secren display, 5 point capacitive touch screen,1024*768 resolution.
Google Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean OS, Allwinner A20 Dual Core CPU (1.2GHz) with Quad core Mali-400 MP GPU, offer unprecedented fast surfing online, video playing and 3D games playing experience

With front & back dual cameras (0.3MP & 5MP), be adequate for skype video chat and taking general picturesdroid tablet
Built-in 3.7V 6000mAh Li-Polymer rechargeable battery, enjoy longer running time (8 hours running time)
